roleset_name: description of the growth rate when x is the first measurement, and each new iteration multiplies the previous measurement against x

roles.descr: the exponent(number of times arg3 is multiplied by itself)
roles.descr_trans: 指数（arg3 与其自身相乘的次数）

roles.descr: the base (number multiplied by itself arg2 times)
roles.descr_trans: 基数（数字乘以自身 arg2 次）

roleset_name_trans: 当 x 是第一个测量值并且每次新迭代将先前的测量值乘以 x 时的增长率描述
